pkgmetadata.longdescription: Measurement Error Modelling using MCEM // Fits measurement error models using Monte Carlo Expectation Maximization (MCEM). For specific details on the methodology, see: Greg C. G. Wei Martin A. Tanner (1990) A Monte Carlo Implementation of the EM Algorithm and the Poor Man's Data Augmentation Algorithms, Journal of the American Statistical Association, 85:411, 699-704 doi:10.1080/01621459.1990.10474930 For more examples on measurement error modelling using MCEM, see the 'RMarkdown' vignette: "'refitME' R-package tutorial".
